words.definition: feeling fear or anxiety
words.example: The woman was afraid of what she saw.

words.definition: to say yes or think the same way
words.example: I agree with you about the restaurant.

words.definition: feeling or showing anger
words.example: She didn't do her homework, so her father is angry.

words.definition: to get to or reach a place
words.example: The bus always arrives at the corner of my street at 4:00.

words.definition: to try to fight or hurt
words.example: The man with the sword attacked the other man first.

words.definition: the lowest part
words.example: The bottom of my shoe has a hole in it.

words.definition: able to solve problems or learn quickly
words.example: The clever boy thought of a good idea.

words.definition: causing pain or suffering to others
words.example: The cruel man yelled at his sister.

words.definition: after a long time or at the end
words.example: He finally crossed the finish line after five hours of running.

words.definition: to put or keep out of sight
words.example: The other children will hide while you count to 100.

words.definition: to look for or search for an animal to kill
words.example: Long ago, people hunted with bows and arrows.

words.definition: a large number or amount
words.example: There are a lot of apples in the basket.

words.definition: the center or halfway point
words.example: The Canadian flag has a maple leaf in the middle of it.

words.definition: a very short time
words.example: I was only a few moments late for the meeting.

words.definition: happy or satisfied
words.example: She was pleased with the phone call she received.

words.definition: to say you will do something for sure
words.example: He promised to return my key by tomorrow.

words.definition: to give an answer
words.example: She asked him what time his meeting was. He replied, at three.

words.definition: not in danger
words.example: Put on your seat belt in the car to be safe.

words.definition: something done to fool another person
words.example: His card trick really surprised us.

words.definition: in a good way
words.example: The couple can dance quite well.
